song_name: Don't Say That One Word I Think Is Funny
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Don't Say That One Word I Think Is Funny has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Don't Say That One Word I Think Is Funny is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
